name: claude-code-marketing
description: Marketing-focused plugin for SEO, content strategy, and brand management. Works standalone with reasoning-based analysis, enhanced with optional Ahrefs/SEMrush/GSC MCP integrations.
author: itsbariscan
postInstall: cd hooks && npm install && npm run build

mcpServers.note: Optional MCP integrations - users configure separately

supported.name: ahrefs
supported.description: Official Ahrefs MCP for keyword/backlink data

supported.name: semrush
supported.description: Official SEMrush MCP for keyword/competitor data

supported.name: gsc
supported.description: Google Search Console MCP for rankings/performance
